sentences.english: In practice, residual values are ignored if they are not expected to be material in amount.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，如果殘值金額預計不大，通常被忽略。

sentences.english: B: Each day, we will be charged for one thousandth of the contract amount.
sentences.chinese: 每天支付合同總金額的千分之一。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 掛號信件，按照國務院郵政主管部門規定的金額賠償。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金額個人貨物款的一個好處是它不需要確認信用度。

sentences.english: Double-entry-accounting: A system of recording every business transaction with equal dollar amounts of both debit and credit entries.
sentences.chinese: 在借方和貸方用相等的金額記錄經濟事項的記賬系統。

sentences.english: P. A. and the Risk of Breakage for 130% invoice value.
sentences.chinese: 保水債險和破碎險，金額爲130%的發票金額。

sentences.english: P. A. and the Risk of Breakage for 130% invoice value.
sentences.chinese: 保水債險和破碎險，金額爲130%的發票金額。

sentences.english: Reinstatement cost of the building or mortgaged loan amount required by the Bank.
sentences.chinese: 樓宇建築之重建費或銀行指定之按揭金額。

sentences.english: Please return the session money to the student.
sentences.chinese: 請將課時金額退至學生賬戶。

sentences.english: Shipping I will let you know when we get exact amount.
sentences.chinese: 海運費的話，等我們知道具體金額再告訴你。

sentences.english: That is roughly what will be deducted automatically from your account over the year.
sentences.chinese: 這大致就是每年自動從你帳戶中扣除的金額。

sentences.english: Exempt withdrawals made up to the required minimum amount from taxation.
sentences.chinese: 從稅收的要求的最低金額中免除提款。

sentences.english: The minimum amount of lump sum contribution is HK$5,000.
sentences.chinese: 整筆供款的最低供款金額爲5，000港元。

sentences.english: Yes. But the sum is large, it must be provided by a group of banks.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但金額巨大，得由一個銀行團來提供。

sentences.english: Annualize the employee's normal wages and compute tax on this amount.
sentences.chinese: 按年計算員工的正常薪資並計算此金額的稅收。

sentences.english: It represents a 28% premium over Wrigley 's current share price.
sentences.chinese: 購併金額是箭牌目前每股股值溢價28%。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
